thread.title: Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after 'too much black forest gateau'
thread.title_full: Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after 'too much black forest gateau'

author: Emma Powell
title: Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after 'too much black forest gateau'
text:
Susanna Reid dropped by Ben Shephard on live TV after ‘too much black forest gateau’ 
The pair tumbled down onto the sofa in fits of laughter Thursday 30 March 2017 15:05 BST Click to follow 
Ben Shephard dropped Susanna Reid as they attempted a Strictly Come Dancing lift on Good Morning Britain . 
Andi Peters challenged the pair to show off their best moves – but it didn’t quite go to plan. 
Putting his hands on Reid’s waist, Shephard said: “Andi wanted to see a lift, so here you go!” 
Reid shrieked as she was hoisted into the air before Shephard buckled and the pair fell backwards onto the sofa. Aching: Ben Shephard holds his back in 'pain' (ITV) 
Reid – whose legs flew up in the air – cried: “Oh my goodness.” 
Holding onto his back, Shephard joked: “I think I’ve put my back out.” 
Les Dennis, who was on the show to promote his role as Uncle Fester in a touring production of The Addams Family, said: “If that was your audition for Strictly – I don’t think you’re going to get that.” 
Reid later joked that Shephard couldn’t keep her in the air because she’d eaten “too much black forest gateau”. Too much black forest gateau 😳 https://t.co/IYhVG5L5jd — Susanna Reid (@susannareid100) March 30, 2017 
Viewers found the incident amusing with one referencing Shephard’s game show Tipping Point: “You can see why Ben presents Tipping Point. He nearly reached it.” 
Another suggested: “Could be a new round for Ninja Warrior UK.” 
A third tweeted: “Piers Morgan isn't going to be best pleased (sic).” Read more
